Package controller

Class BrickController

java.lang.Object
controller.BrickController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CementBrickModel, ClayBrickModel, FireBrickModel, IceBrickModel, SteelBrickModel
public abstract class BrickController
extends java.lang.Object
The BrickController abstract class provides a template that allows different types of Bricks to be created. It is responsible for defining its shape and location The color is defined by the implementation class of the BrickController. Implements simple behaviour regarding the strength of the brick.

    • setImpact

      public boolean setImpact​(java.awt.geom.Point2D collisionPoint, int crackDir)
      Method implementation when WallController detects a collision between the Ball and the Brick. The impact() method is called
      Parameters:
      collisionPoint - - The point of impact.
      crackDir - - The direction at which the Crack will be created.
      Returns:
      A boolean value of the Brick's state - False if the brick is broken

    • impact
